channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: My First Post
item.description:
This is my first blog post using Hugo with Tailwind CSS.

Introduction

Hugo is a fast and modern static site generator written in Go, and designed to make website creation fun again.

Why Tailwind CSS?

Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that allows for rapid UI development without leaving your HTML.
